title: Comparative Analysis and Optimization Design of Construction Surveying Education Course Outcomes by Duration

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: An environment requiring intensive integrated theory/practice education for current practitioners in a short period, combining self-directed learning using personal devices with in-person practical sessions

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three core theories of construction surveying based on practical cases within one week.
Learners can perform surveying tasks within an error margin of ±2 cm using field-type simulation equipment.
Learners can demonstrate balanced achievement in theory and practice with a total score of at least 70/100 at the end of the course.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
